review.summary: Domain layer __init__.py file that serves as the public API for the events domain. This file exports core domain entities and value objects following Clean Architecture principles. The file is well-structured, follows neo-commons conventions, and provides a clear interface to the domain layer with proper separation of concerns.

positive_observations.observation: Excellent adherence to Clean Architecture - domain layer is completely independent of infrastructure concerns
Perfect compliance with neo-commons __all__ pattern for explicit API control
Clear separation between entities and value objects with proper imports
Well-documented module purpose with comprehensive docstring
Follows maximum separation principle with focused imports from specific modules
Consistent naming conventions throughout (Event, EventMetadata, EventId, etc.)
